name: Deathblade
pasive: Whenever the wearer kills or participates in killing an enemy, gain +15 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. Starts with 1 stack. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Giant Slayer
pasive: Attacks deal an additional 9% enemy max health as true damage

name: Hextech Gunblade
pasive: Heal for 33% of all damage dealt.

name: Spear of Shojin
pasive: After casting, wearer gains 18% of its max mana per attack.

name: Guardian Angel
pasive: Wearer revives with 500 Health after a 2 sec delay.

name: Bloodthirster
pasive: Attacks heal for 50% of damage.

name: Zeke's Herald
pasive: At the start of combat, allies within the same row gain +15% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Blade of the Ruined King
pasive: Wearer is also a Blademaster.

name: Infinity Edge
pasive: 100% critical strike damage.

name: Rapid Firecannon
pasive: Attack Range is doubled.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
pasive: Attacks grant 5% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.

name: Statikk Shiv
pasive: Every 3rd attack deals 85 splash magical damage to 3/4/5 additional targets.

name: Titan's Resolve
pasive: When the wearer is hit or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus, up to 100%. At 50 stacks, the wearer gains 25 Armor and MR; and increases in size. Resets every round.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
pasive: Basic Attack fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
pasive: When the wearer dies, a Construct arises to continue the fight.

name: Infiltrator's Talons
pasive: Wearer is also an Infiltrator.

name: Last Whisper
pasive: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 90% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
pasive: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%.

name: Luden's Echo
pasive: Spells deal 150/175/225 splash damage on hit.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
pasive: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250/275/350 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

name: Ionic Spark
pasive: Enemies within 3 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 25% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 20% of their max Mana.

name: Morellonomicon
pasive: Spells deal burn damage equal to 18% of the enemy's maximum health over 10 seconds and prevent healing.

name: Demolitionist's Charge
pasive: Wearer is also a Demolitionist

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
pasive: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

name: Seraph's Embrace
pasive: After casting their spell, the wearer restores 20 Mana.

name: Frozen Heart
pasive: Nearby enemies' attack speed is slowed by 40%. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

name: Chalice of Favor
pasive: Whenever the holder casts a spell, gives all nearby allies 20 mana.

name: Redemption
pasive: On crossing below 25% health, heal all nearby allies for 1200 health.

name: Star Guardian's Charm
pasive: Wearer is also a Star Guardian.

name: Hand Of Justice
pasive: On round start, either gain 50% more damage or 50 life on hit.

name: Bramble Vest
pasive: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 140/140/200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

name: Sword Breaker
pasive: Attacks have a 25% chance to disarm for 3 seconds.

name: Red Buff
pasive: Attacks deal 18% of the enemy's maximum Health as burn damage over 10s and prevent healing.

name: Rebel Medal
pasive: Wearer is also a Rebel.

name: Shroud of Stillness
pasive: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

name: Dragon's Claw
pasive: Gain 50% resistance to magic damage.

name: Zephyr
pasive: On start of combat, banish an enemy for 7 seconds.

name: Celestial Orb
pasive: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

name: Quicksilver
pasive: The wearer is immune to crowd control.

name: Warmog's Armor
pasive: Wearer regenerates 6% maximum Health per second.

name: Protector's Chestguard
pasive: Wearer is also a Protector.

name: Trap Claw
pasive: On combat begin, gain a spell shield. When it breaks, stun the champion who broke the shield for 4s.

name: Force of Nature
pasive: Gain +1 team size.

name: Dark Star's Heart
pasive: Wearer is also a Dark Star.

name: Thief's Gloves
pasive: This item takes all three item slots. On round begin, copy two random items.
